events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The system has automatically categorized this case as a Refund request based on the customer's complaint about receiving the wrong item.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's incorrect order.
Hello! I’m Lisa, and I’m here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received, so I can process your refund faster?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a photo showing the item that arrived is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and you can expect the amount back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue quickly.
The refund has been processed and you should receive a confirmation email shortly. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything was handled to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was completed and there are no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
